content: Hello! You've reached XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
I think I might have called the wrong number. I was trying to reach my friend, not a home service.
No problem at all! Since this isn’t related to our services, would you like me to mark this number accordingly so we don’t contact you again?
Understood. I’m marking your number as wrong contact to avoid any future messages from us. Have a great day!
reason: Customer misdialed and requested no further contact.
